entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Montmagny
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:20 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning in the evening. Amount possibly reaching 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
